programme.title: Oh, God! You Devil
programme.desc: A musician sells his soul to the Devil, as God and the Devil battle for the musician's soul.

programme.title: Joe Versus the Volcano
programme.desc: Joe works for a hideous corporation, but everything changes when he goes on a journey around the world.

programme.title: Night Shift
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck financial planner meets a fast-talking loser at the New York City morgue.

programme.title: Up the Academy
programme.desc: Four young slackers meet when they are sent to a military academy.

programme.title: The Killing Fields
programme.desc: Reporter Sydney Schanberg and Cambodian translator Dith Pran cover the 1975 Khmer Rouge takeover of Cambodia.

programme.title: Home Fries
programme.desc: A young assassin can't decide whether to murder or marry his latest victim in Home Fries.

programme.title: Elvis: That's The Way It Is (Special Edition)
programme.desc: This 1970 feature-length concert film follows Elvis, as the legendary musician begins his emotional comeback.

programme.title: The Mission
programme.desc: Two men of God defy great military powers to protect those who seek sanctuary in The Mission.

programme.title: Over the Edge
programme.desc: Affluent middle-American suburban teenagers begin to see the flaws in their surroundings and lifestyles.

programme.title: The Majestic
programme.desc: After screenwriter Peter develops amnesia in small-town 1951, he assumes the identity of a missing war hero.

programme.title: Local Hero
programme.desc: An oil billionaire tries to buy out the residents of a seaside village.

programme.title: Corrina, Corrina
programme.desc: Whoopi Goldberg stars in this story of a family devastated by grief and the woman who helps heal the loss.
